derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from or related to Low German sprick

entry.tran: (尤指烹饪或装饰用的)带叶小枝
entry.def: A sprig is a small stem with leaves on it which has been picked from a bush or plant, especially so that it can be used in cooking or as a decoration.

means.word_mean: 1. small branch or division of a branch; usually applied to branches of the current or preceding year
2. an ornament that resembles a spray of leaves or flowers
